info.name: Chastity Belt (/r/CircleOfTrust)
info.description:
Gets rid of the Betray button + Copy Password option for Reddit's 2018 April Fools social experiment (Circle of Trust). Now you can't Betray a circle yourself or easily copy the password to get other people to betray it.

No temptation anymore.

#YOLO (You Oughta Look Out)
